mapper.sql: PK_ASSET_PROP, PROP_NAME, PROP_CODE, PROP_DESC, PK_PROP_CLASS, BS_TYPE, DATA_TYPE, IS_VIEW, NEED_VALUE, COLLECT_TYPE, COME_FROM, IS_DELETED, PK_CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, PK_MENDER, MEND_TIME_LAST
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from am_asset_prop
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into am_asset_prop (PK_ASSET_PROP, PROP_NAME, PROP_CODE, PROP_DESC, PK_PROP_CLASS, BS_TYPE, DATA_TYPE, IS_VIEW, NEED_VALUE, COLLECT_TYPE, COME_FROM, IS_DELETED, PK_CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, PK_MENDER, MEND_TIME_LAST) values (#{pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkPropClass,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bsType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{collectType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

PK_ASSET_PROP,
PROP_NAME,

PROP_DESC,

IS_VIEW,
NEED_VALUE,
COLLECT_TYPE,
COME_FROM,
IS_DELETED,
PK_CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,
PK_MENDER,
MEND_TIME_LAST,

mapper.update:
update am_asset_prop
PK_ASSET_PROP = #{record.pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROP_NAME = #{record.propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROP_CODE = #{record.propCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROP_DESC = #{record.propDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_PROP_CLASS = #{record.pkPropClass,jdbcType=CHAR},
BS_TYPE = #{record.bsType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DATA_TYPE = #{record.dataType,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_VIEW = #{record.isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
NEED_VALUE = #{record.needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
COLLECT_TYPE = #{record.collectType,jdbcType=CHAR},
COME_FROM = #{record.comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PK_CREATOR = #{record.pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_MENDER = #{record.pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEND_TIME_LAST = #{record.mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update am_asset_prop set PK_ASSET_PROP = #{record.pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROP_NAME = #{record.propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROP_CODE = #{record.propCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROP_DESC = #{record.propDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_PROP_CLASS = #{record.pkPropClass,jdbcType=CHAR}, BS_TYPE = #{record.bsType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DATA_TYPE = #{record.dataType,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_VIEW = #{record.isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, NEED_VALUE = #{record.needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, COLLECT_TYPE = #{record.collectType,jdbcType=CHAR}, COME_FROM = #{record.comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PK_CREATOR = #{record.pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_MENDER = #{record.pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEND_TIME_LAST = #{record.mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update am_asset_prop
PROP_NAME = #{propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROP_CODE = #{propCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROP_DESC = #{propDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_PROP_CLASS = #{pkPropClass,jdbcType=CHAR},
BS_TYPE = #{bsType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_VIEW = #{isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
NEED_VALUE = #{needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
COLLECT_TYPE = #{collectType,jdbcType=CHAR},
COME_FROM = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_MENDER = #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEND_TIME_LAST = #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PK_ASSET_PROP = #{pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR}

update am_asset_prop set PROP_NAME = #{propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROP_CODE = #{propCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROP_DESC = #{propDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_PROP_CLASS = #{pkPropClass,jdbcType=CHAR}, BS_TYPE = #{bsType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_VIEW = #{isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, NEED_VALUE = #{needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, COLLECT_TYPE = #{collectType,jdbcType=CHAR}, COME_FROM = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_MENDER = #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEND_TIME_LAST = #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_ASSET_PROP = #{pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select a.PK_ASSET_PROP, a.PROP_NAME,a.PROP_CODE,a.DATA_TYPE,b.PROP_CLASS_NAME as PK_PROP_CLASS,a.BS_TYPE,a.COLLECT_TYPE FROM am_asset_prop a,am_prop_class b where a.PK_PROP_CLASS=b.PK_PROP_CLASS and a.IS_DELETED=0

SELECT a.*,b.COLLECT_TYPE as COLLECT_TYPE2,b.COME_FROM as COME_FROM2 , b.IS_VIEW as IS_VIEW2,b.NEED_VALUE as NEED_VALUE2 FROM `am_asset_prop` a ,`am_asset_type_prop` b WHERE a.`PK_ASSET_PROP` = b.`PK_ASSET_PROP` AND b.`PK_ASSET_TYPE` =#{id};
select *from am_asset_prop a where a.PK_ASSET_PROP NOT in((select a.PK_ASSET_PROP FROM am_asset_type_prop a where a.PK_ASSET_TYPE=#{id}))
